content.7: The prediction mask of the ground truth CAR region is quite poor. The boundaries are very imprecise and irregular, with large portions of the CAR being missed. The prediction seems to hallucinate some regions outside the actual CAR area.
content.15: The prediction mask of the ground truth PERSON region is quite rough and irregular. The boundaries are imprecise, with significant under-segmentation on the right side of the scene and over-segmentation on the left side.

content.12: The prediction mask of the ground truth DOG region is quite rough and irregular. The boundaries are less defined and more jagged compared to the ground truth. There's noticeable under-segmentation along the edges of the DOG, particularly on the right side.
content.17: The prediction mask of the ground truth SHEEP region is quite fragmented and incomplete. Large portions of the SHEEP have been missed, while the boundaries are very rough and irregular. The prediction seems to have hallucinated some small, isolated segments within the scene, far from the main SHEEP region.
